availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bedford, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Catharine M. Young Greenwood in Trimble County on July 17, 1843. Father of M. F. Greenwood and N. A. Greenwood. Clerk in Bedford in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Bedford, p. 400A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, TrimbleCounty Marriages, Film #000420388.
Find A Grave, "Isaac Shelby Greenwood (October 31, 1815-December 28, 1878)," Memorial #81674304, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/81674304 (accessed August 14, 2018).
